name: People's Republic of China
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: The historical tide of the reunification of the motherland is unstoppable!
attacked: The Chinese people will not stand by and allow a foreign power to humiliate us again!
defeated: You have defeated our glorious party, but you will never defeat the indomitable spirit of the Chinese people!
introduction: Greetings. I am Xi Jinping, Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. Don't play games with me.
hateNo: China cannot accept such outrageous terms!
afterPeace: At last, our nations are at peace again.
tradeRequest: We offer you this win-win agreement to advance the common prosperity of our nations.
uniqueName: Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation
uniques: Can build [all] improvements at a [+25]% rate
